channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLbreakingNews
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLbreakingNews, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump officials loosen strings on federal education money for Iowa. More states could follow
item.description: The Trump administration is giving Iowa more power to decide how it spends its federal education money

item.title: Trumpâ€™s offshore wind project freeze draws lawsuits from states and developers
item.description: Offshore wind developers and states are suing the Trump administration over its order to suspend work on five large-scale projects under construction ...

item.title: US military action in Venezuela is seen as both a blessing and a curse for Russia's Putin
item.description: The U.S. military operation in Venezuela can be seen as both a benefit and a burden for Russian President Vladimir Putin

item.title: New dietary guidelines urge Americans to avoid processed foods and added sugar
item.description: New guidelines for healthy eating say Americans should eat more whole foods and protein, fewer highly processed foods and less added sugar

item.title: Winter storms bring snow, ice and school and road closures to New England. More bad weather's coming
item.description: Messy winter weather brought snow, ice, freezing rain and dangerous driving to the New England states as the region prepared for more unpleasant condi...
